trans-unit.source: Hosts a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] window as an element within [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window, create a class that derives from HwndHost.

Override the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore%2A> method and create your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window as a child of the parent window that is passed into the method.

> [!IMPORTANT] > Although HwndHost derives from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, various properties of HwndHost that come from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and other intermediate classes such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> are not generally mapped to possible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] equivalents.
Also, not all <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> / <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> input events transfer across the interoperation boundary.

HwndHost derives from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> primarily so that an HwndHost instance can be inserted into the widest variety of possible content models, and so that default <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> layout characteristics can apply.
For more details on HwndHost, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"></xref> class.
> [!IMPORTANT] > This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone.
